patterns: How you could help me?
What you can do?
What help you provide?
How you can be helpful?
What support is offered
responses: I am your assistant to guide you through products, stores and customer support of XYZ Foods Pvt. Ltd.
You may ask me regarding products, stores and order support of XYZ Foods Pvt. Ltd.

patterns: Which are the products that XYZ Foods sells?
What is the range of products in the company?
Tell me regarding types of products XYZ Foods serves.
List out the products that your company sells
responses: XYZ foods serves you with potato chips with 3 flavours and soft drinks with 2 flavours.
Here's a list of range of products: Potato chips(3 flavours) and Soft drinks(2 flavours).

patterns: Which are the flavours in the potato chips category?
What is the range of flavouring in chips?
Tell me regarding types of flavours that XYZ Foods serves in chips.
List out the flavours of chips that your company sells
responses: XYZ foods serves you with potato chips with 3 flavours: Tomato, Onion and Chilli.
Here's a list flavours of chips that we serve: 1)Tomato 2)Onion 3)Chilli.

patterns: Which are the flavours in the soft drinks category?
What is the range of flavouring in drinks?
Tell me regarding types of flavours that XYZ Foods serves in cold drinks
List out the flavours of soft drinks that your company sells.
responses: XYZ foods serves you with soft drinks of 2 flavours: Cola and Orange.
Here's a list flavours of cold drinks that we serve: 1)Cola 2)Orange.

patterns: What is the price of each sachet of chips?
What is the pricing of onion flavour in chips?
What is the rate of single pack of chips?
What is the cost of single packet of chips?
Tell me regarding price of tomato flavour of chips that XYZ Foods serves
What is the price of one sachet of chilli flavoured chips?
responses: Each Sachet of chips of 40 grams net weight costs 10 rupees for each flavour.
All flavours of chips cost 10 rupees per packet with net weight 40 grams.

patterns: What is the quantity in each sachet of chips?
What is the net weight of each onion flavoured sachet?
What is the weight in grams of single pack of chips?
Tell me regarding quantity per packet of tomato flavour of chips that XYZ Foods serves
What is the net quantity in grams of one sachet of chilli flavoured chips?
responses: Each Sachet of chips has 40 grams net weight and costs 10 rupees for each flavour.
All flavours of chips have 40 grams net weight per packet which costs 10 rupees.

patterns: What is the price of each bottle of soft drink?
What is the pricing of orange flavour in cold drinks?
What is the rate of 500ml of drinks?
What is the cost of one bottle of drinks?
Tell me regarding price of cola flavour of cold drinks that XYZ Foods serves
What is the price of one bottle of soft drink?
responses: Each bottle of cold drinks of 500ml net volume costs 40 rupees for each flavour.
All flavours of soft drinks cost 40 rupees per bottle with net quantity 500ml.

patterns: What is the quantity in each bottle of soft drink?
What is the net quantity of each orange flavoured cold drink bottle?
What is the quantity in mililitres of single bottle of drinks?
Tell me regarding quantity per bottle of cola flavour of cold drink that XYZ Foods serves.
What is the net quantity in one packed soft drink?
responses: Each bottle of cold drink have 500ml net volume which costs 40 rupees for each flavour.
All flavours of soft drinks are available in bottles with net quantity 500ml pricing 40 rupees each.

patterns: Where are the stores of XYZ Foods Pvt. Ltd. located?
What are the locations of stores?
Provide me with location of stores of XYZ foods.
In which cities are the stores located?
responses: XYZ Foods has 3 stores located in Mumbai, Bengaluru and Pune.
Currently, XYZ foods has 3 stores residing in Mumbai, Bengaluru and Pune.

patterns: Where can I buy the products of XYZ foods?
How can I order chips at home?
How can I buy cold drinks at my location?
Where do I buy products from online?
Where do I find your products on web?
responses: The official website XYZ Foods is www.XYZfoods123.com. You can order our products on this website.
